Description: Terra Sigillata wheel-made pottery sherd from a cup with a fine glossy red slip. Fine light red pottery fabric.
Curator's comments: Imperial Roman red slip fine tableware sherd of Italian Terra Sigillata ware, cup form dated c. 20BC-100AD (Ettlinger et al. 1990, form ITS 14/15 or similar). Ettlinger, E., Hedinger, B., Hoffmann, B., Kenrick, P. M., Pucci, G., Roth-Rubi, K., Schneider, G., von Schnurbein, S., Wells, C. M. & Zabehlicky-Scheffenegger, S. 1990. Conspectus formarum terrae sigillatae Italico modo confectae. Bonn: Dr. Rudolf Habelt GMBH.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IF.027) (Phase 3)
